title: Student filmmakers:  Behind the scenes and on the screen
author: Grace Doh
description: The Justice spotlights three student filmmakers and their most important projects thus far.

title: Producer Yeeshai Gross on giving back to his community
author: Lauren Goodman
description: Yeeshai Gross discusses his career in the entertainment industry and producing “The Witness Project,” “Paper Clips” and more.

title: ‘Star Image,’ celebrities and the Oscars
author: Julia Hardy
description: How do award ceremonies, celebrities and the media work together to sustain the entertainment industry and its major players?

title: A visual analysis of  ‘Saint Luke Drawing the Virgin’
author: Liliana Aspromonte
description: A walk-through of the elements that make this Northern Renaissance piece by Rogier van der Weyden.

title: 17th century portraiture in the  Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum
author: Liliana Aspromonte
description: A breakdown of four portraits by Dutch painters Pourbus, Rubens, Van Dyck and Rembrandt.

title: The Make a Difference group allows members of BOLLI to have an effect on the upcoming presidential election
author: Anna Martin
description: Once a month, members of the Brandeis community meet and write postcards encouraging those in swing states to vote.

title: Creativity never ends: Kate Risse  on writing ‘Inland’ and thinking about the future of our planet
author: Mirabell Rowland
description: Author Kate Risse discusses writing her debut novel and the inspirations that shaped the story.
